original_title: Balladenmagazin Nr. 9: ›Die Liebe stört der kalte Tod‹
overview: Since German Classicism, it has become customary to translate extreme, emotional events into a ballad, a popular form of song. This ‘Balladen Magazin’ brings Cossack lamentations, the horrors of the war in Chechnya, and the execution of the unfortunate Emperor Maximilian of Mexico, among others...
title: Ballad Journal No. 9: “Cold Death Interrupts Love”
